title: Drawing, "Table"
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Small stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in red color pencil at upper right: V. & S. - D - 2; inscribed dimensions, materials; inscribed in graphite in lower right: SCALE 1"-1'-0"/7271 [circled]; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P
description: Perspective drawing for rectangular table in upper right, plan and elevation in lower left. Top of table is rectangular, drawer below has long, horizontal drawer pull. Base of table with curved edges and straight legs. Two options given for materials on the drawing: black lacquer top, legs, and frame with walnut body; red lacquer base with white sycamore body and top.
